features: 【Premium Exquisite Set】 The magnetic tiles set can be used in open kid's creative games and can be assembled into various interesting magnetic shapes. Create a childlike world, create more works, more possibilities. A good choice of toys for 3 4 5 6 7 8 year old boys and girls.

【SAFE BUILDING TOYS】 Using high-quality ABS material, bright in colour. Building blocks surface groove design, easy to grasp and not slippery. Strong magnets. Large size, prevent accidental swallowing, parents can rest assured. Very fit toys for toddlers and a sensory toys for toddlers 3-4.

【LEARNING & EDUCATION TOYS】 Educational toys for kids 3 4 5-7 8. Advanced challenges from 2D to 3D, to establish children's sense of space, and to help children better understand colors and geometric shapes. Exercise children's hands-on ability, develop thinking skills and hand-eye coordination.

【FUN GAMES】 Enrich children's imagination and creativity. A parent-child toy that guides children's growth and cognition and Improve relationship. They are also family games for relaxing on weekends. We highly recommend toys for kids.

【GIFTS FOR KIDS】 Exquisite gift boxes, containing creative model instructions and storage bags. You can play games with your children at home or outdoors. It is also used for school, kindergarten, New Year, birthday, and Christmas gifts.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Party Games Party games for kids. Girl and boy toys. Let children to grow up happily together when they play together happily. In the process of enjoying the game of splicing works, children can communicate with each other and share their own ideas, promote brain development, and stimulate children's imagination and various potential creativity. Help children learn how to solve problems while playing.

Stem Toys Enjoy magnet toy creation from 2D to 3D. Stem toys for 3 4 5 6 7 8 year old.Trains children's coordination ability and improves children's intelligence IQ. It is a perfect teaching and learning tool for children and teachers. It is an educational toy for children to develop science, skills, architecture and mathematics while having fun. Let the kids explore the alphabet, the world of mathematics, the world of animals, and the world of construction toys in the process of building.

Magnetic Blocks Learn the principle of positive and negative poles of magnet.Adopting magnetic adsorption design, will not hurt your baby's hands. Learning Toys Bright colors, clever use of color matching.Exercise children's color recognition ability. Magnets for Kids Variety of magnetic building sticks. Toys for 3 + years old boys and girls.

Christmas Gifts Magnetic Building Blocks is a perfect gift for boys and girls !This play set will keep kids entertained for hours!Kids can now stretch their imagination to the next level by creating different styles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars SUCH a fun building STEM toy!
reviews.reviewText: Bought these magnetic building toys for my kindergarten classroom. The students love being able to build and create all kinds of different things. I loved the bag to keep everything in when they clean up. The kids can be creative and build so many different things with this set. It's been a huge hit in kindergarten!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Magnet Building Blocks
reviews.reviewText: Lots of fun for my 6 year olds. Colorful and very well made. They have them in the cars to play with during long drives and it’s a perfect distraction for them. I enjoy building with them in my free time too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Bought 2 sets for Christmas
reviews.reviewText: Magnets are the as strong as I had expected. You can only build one level or it all topples. I also thought they were coated with a rubber or silicone. They are just plastic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautifully packaged- great gift for little hands
reviews.reviewText: We love these big magnetic blocks! My husband and I build with the kids and they are fun! The pieces are not just linear but also have curve and round shapes. We make 2D and 3D builds which look so realistic and offer a great beginner building experience for my 7 yo. I mostly love that my curious 3yo can’t accidentally swallow small pieces because there are none. The safety of these building blocks is very important. All pieces offer mobility which enhances the building experience. Because the pieces are magnetically connected and have round pieces, they can involve motion for children builders ready for a scaffolded experience. We absolutely love these blocks and recommend them for beginner builders.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I thought these would be a fun toy similar to magnatiles but these felt a little too cheap and flimsy so I returned them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I got this at for my daughter's birthday. She just turned seven. She loves this kind on thing. She loves to explorer with stuff like this because it helps her brain figure out how things work within science. This allows her to build as high as she can and we wide as she can. She also does weight tests to see how much she can support. Great find. This comes with tons of balls and sticks for lots of play.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of time
reviews.reviewText: Our 2.5 year old son is in ot therapy and speech therapy weekly, so I've come in contact with a ton of toys (especially stem toys). One toy that our son is obsessed with (not just for 5 minutes) is SmartMax magnetic toys. This review will compare the two.Right from the gate I was not impressed with the size of the package. I already felt the stench of failure from this purchase, but tried to keep an open mind. As you can see from my picture, the Smartmax toys are noticeably larger (the blue and orange coloured sticks). The Smartmax set we own is not the XL set either.When you shake the sticks from this particular set, they rattle. None of the Smartmax pieces rattle or feel flimsy. I am concerned that the magnet could become a choking hazard in the future.This set also feels much lighter like dollar tree plastic toys. Most of the seams don't completely come together which might account for the rattling sound because the magnets aren't properly secured. They also give me the feeling that if one of us adults accidentally steps on one of these pieces that it will crack in half. I mean I'm not exaggerating how cheap this plastic feels. I wonder if its even safe for little mouths in regards to toxins?? A few pieces have white marks from I can only guess is friction while shipping because all the pieces were loose inside the box. The Smartmax toys plastic feels harder, more sturdier, and the color is more saturated than the set I'm reviewing. Overall I would not recommend until they change their materials, design, and quality in general.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for a 4year old.
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this for my 4 yr old Grandson. He's enjoyed 'building' toys from baby on. He now attends Montessori & loves it! What this set offers - CURVED pieces which sets it apart from other 'building' toys. These curved pieces enhance creativity. The size of the pieces are perfect for little hands.
